Hi guys,
I need to create automated acceptance tests. Selenium seems to be
=
nice, since it allows someone without much (or none at all)
programming exp=
erience, as our Product Owner to create those tests
with Firefox Selenium I=
DE plug-in.

But time has come to integrate those tests to other JUnit test=
s, so
these can be run on CI server.

Is there any know-how or link which c=
ould help. I already visited
mavenium (http://mavenium.sourceforge.net/inde=
x.html) and
maven2-selenium plug-in
site(http://mojo.codehaus.org/selenium-=
maven-plugin/index.html), but
documentation is not quite clear, or at least=
 I couldn't run my tests.

As I understood, selenium-rc should run automati=
cally if defined in
pom.xml and then Selenium JUnit tests should run fine. =
What about
jetty? Is it run implicitly, or some server should be run? If no=
t
automatically, should it be run manually? In this case CI doesn't make
se=
nse, since you have to deploy application to some other server.

Huh...too =
many questions, I guess. I would be happy to have at least
some answers.

R=
egards,
Marko
